T02TD2346E:4a-1: tatt'am do ha g'i ti ka n'a ma /
T02TD2346E:4a-3: do ha mdzod kyi de nyid kyi glu zhes bya ba /
T02TD2346E:4a-4: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2346E:4a-5: brtags na bdag gzhan dngos po med //
T02TD2346E:4a-6: byis ba lkugs pa'i rmi lam 'dra //
T02TD2346E:4a-7: de nyid rtogs pa shin tu dka' //
T02TD2346E:4a-8: byis pa rgyan po rtse ba 'dra //
T02TD2346E:4a-9: tha ka na ni smra bar byed //
T02TD2346E:4a-10: de nyid tshig gis brjod pa dka' //
T02TD2346E:4a-11: snang stong rtog pa ma sel bar //
T02TD2346E:4a-12: thar pa thob par ga la 'gyur //
T02TD2346E:4a-13: lus ngag yid gsum dbyings su ni //
T02TD2346E:4a-14: de nyid mnyam par ma shes na //
T02TD2346E:4a-15: de nyid rtogs par shin tu dka' //
T02TD2346E:4a-16: byis pa rgyan po rtse ba 'dra //
T02TD2346E:4a-17: dngos po tshig gis brjod pa dka' //
T02TD2346E:4a-18: chos rnams tshig tu smra ba yang //
T02TD2346E:4a-19: tshig tsam gyis ni 'grub pa bam ca //
T02TD2346E:4a-20: sems kyi de nyid ma rtogs par //
T02TD2346E:4a-21: thams cad gcig par rtogs pa med //
T02TD2346E:4a-22: don dam rtogs pa shin tu dka' //
T02TD2346E:4a-23: byis ba rgyan po rtse ba 'dra //
T02TD2346E:4a-24: tha ka na ni smra bar byed //
T02TD2346E:4a-25: do ha mdzod kyi de nyid kyi glu zhes bya ba slob dpon ka na ri nas brgyud pa tha ka nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
